channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-18877] HiveSchemaTool.validateSchemaTables() should wrap a SQLException when rethrowing
item.description: If schematool is run with the -verbose flag then it will print a stack trace for an exception that occurs. If a SQLException is caught during HiveSchemaTool.validateSchemaTables() then a HiveMetaException is rethrown containing the text of the SQLException. If we instead throw  a HiveMetaException that wraps the SQLException then the stacktrace will help with diagnosis of issues where the SQLException contains a generic error text.
item.summary: HiveSchemaTool.validateSchemaTables() should wrap a SQLException when rethrowing

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
